preferences.darkModeDescription: Toggle between light and dark theme
preferences.accentColorDescription: Select or customize the accent color
preferences.uiScaleDescription: Adjust the size of the search interface
preferences.searchPositionDescription: Choose where the search window appears on your screen.

searchPositionOptions.cursorDescription: Window appears at your mouse cursor position
searchPositionOptions.centerDescription: Always show on your main display

preferences.showFavoritesDescription: Show favorite items when search is empty
preferences.autostartDescription: Launch Seeksy when your computer starts
preferences.searchShortcutDescription: Global keyboard shortcut to open search
preferences.languageDescription: Select the display language for the interface

watchedFolders.title: Indexed Directories
watchedFolders.noFolders: No folders are currently being watched
watchedFolders.noFoldersHint: Add a directory to begin indexing.
watchedFolders.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove '{path}' from watched directories? All indexed files from this folder will be removed from the database.
watchedFolders.folderAlreadyWatched: The directory "{path}" is already being watched.
watchedFolders.folderIsSubfolder: The directory "{path}" is already included in watched folder "{parent}".
watchedFolders.folderContainsWatched: This folder contains {count} already watched subfolder(s). Adding this folder will replace those individual folders.

addDialog.pleaseWait: Please wait while we analyze the folder size.
addDialog.largeWarningMessage: Selected folders contain {count} files, which exceeds the recommended limit of {limit} files.
addDialog.largeWarningHint: Indexing a large number of files may degrade application performance.

removedFoldersNotice.title: Folders Automatically Removed
removedFoldersNotice.message: The following watched folders could not be found and have been removed from the index:

performance.title: Performance Settings
performance.autoDescription: Settings are being automatically adjusted for optimal performance based on system load and activity.
performance.delayDescription: Higher values reduce system load but slow down indexing
performance.batchDescription: Larger batch sizes can improve performance but may use more memory

info.title: About Seeksy
info.author: Author
info.upToDateMessage: Seeksy v{version} is the latest version
info.autoInstallNote: The update will also be installed automatically when you quit the app.
info.clearCacheDescription: Remove all cached image and video thumbnails to free up disk space.
info.clearCacheConfirmMessage: This will remove {count} cached thumbnails ({size}). Thumbnails will be regenerated as needed.
info.clearCacheConfirmMessageSimple: This will remove all cached thumbnails. Thumbnails will be regenerated as needed.
info.resetAppDescription: This will clear all settings and indexed data. This action cannot be undone.
info.resetAppConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the application? This will clear all settings, indexed data, and favorites. This action cannot be undone.

noWatchedFolders.description: Add folders in Settings to start searching your files.
